managementsystem

Class Ask

  • java.lang.Object
    • managementsystem.Ask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Ask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Ask class, an ask is an ask for a loan made by a borrower. Its characteristics are an HashMap where keys are the models asked for and the values the corresponding quantity, a period and the borrower who made the ask.
    Author:
    Marc Karassev, Anthony Sara√Øs
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ask()
      Default constructor, constructs an ask with an empty HashMap for the asked stuff, and default period and borrower.
      Ask(java.util.HashMap<Model,java.lang.Integer> aS, Period p, Borrower b)
      Constructs a new ask with the specified HashMap for the asked stuff, period and borrower.
